document.full_text: u.s. retailer sears holdings corp  reported a wider-than-expected quarterly loss as sales at its namesake stores plunged both at its home turf and in canada.
document.title: sears disappoints on weak sales in u.s., canada
lines_and_colors: u.s. retailer sears holdings corp  reported a wider-than-expected quarterly loss as sales at its namesake stores plunged both at its home turf and in canada.
